Title: It was a Pentest
Description: Ha! Ha! Just kidding, you were never attacked! The CEO hired an external firm (BHIS?) to run an unannounced Red Team.
Notes: This is almost always a bittersweet moment for companies. On the one hand, they are glad it wasn't the real thing. On the otherâ€¦well, they were compromised. It's time to start working through how to prevent this from happening again.
